text:
Hi Team,
We are trying to accept an offer on our utility app and we are getting the following error message:
```{"code":404,"body":"The requested resource could not be found.","headers":{"content-length":"42","content-type":"text/plain; charset=UTF-8","date":"Mon, 30 Jun 2025 10:11:56 GMT","strict-transport-security":"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"}}```
We are on the latest versions. How can we resolve the issue to be able to accept the offer? Thanks.

text:
Hi Wayne, sorry but we have a few more questions.

1. For devnet, authentication seems not to be mandatory, but for Mainnet, is it correct to assume that validators cannot connect to the Ledger API without OIDC authentication?
2. Also, if we implement internal IP restrictions via a load balancer without using authentication, would any internal member be able to do wallet onboarding?

elements.text: Hi Wayne, sorry but we have a few more questions.
For devnet, authentication seems not to be mandatory, but for Mainnet, is it correct to assume that validators cannot connect to the Ledger API without OIDC authentication?
2. Also, if we implement internal IP restrictions via a load balancer without using authentication, would any internal member be able to do wallet onboarding?

text: Got it, thank you for clarification!

elements.text: Got it, thank you for clarification!
